name: AndroidPolice 2.0 Uncluttered!
description:
An uncluttered redesign of AndroidPolice's awesome website!

The recent restyle of AndroidPolice is great, but it's a bit too cluttered with all those redundant widgets.
With this style, the focus is back on the content, and there is more place to discover news.

Enjoy!


PS: optimised for 1366px screens ;-)
PPS: if you like reading at night, you might want to check out style 110111!
additional_info:
Version 1.0

- Removed the two top widgets
- Removed the sidebar
- Removed the footer
- Widened the content of the main page
- Removed the widget at the end of the articles
- Ads are not removed of course, we all want Androidpolice to keep going :-)


Version 1.1

- Removed remaining widget headers 


----Thanks hideheader for the tips!
